data.message: To anyone famous you push your leftist Reptilian satanic shit my way and I will blast you back to hell where you came from. Famous people better remember why the fuck your famous because We made you! So go against the American way of life then consider your being famous over. We the people will not stand for idiots telling us what to do. So to anyone who was with her I'm done with you! Go America down with the new world order!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
